title: JFlix
description: JFlix is a full-stack Netflix clone with a Node.js (Express) backend and an Angular frontend built in TypeScript. It features Firebase Google authentication, TMDB-powered movie data, MongoDB for user preferences, and sleek horizontal scrolling movie sections styled with Tailwind CSS.
